oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Medications and treatment practices used on California dairies: A survey of veterinarians
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Karle, B. M.
Payne, M. A.
Price, P. L.
Ostrowski, S. S.
Meyer, D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: pharmaceutical use
dairy operations
data collection
water resources
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: During the December, 2010, Central Valley Regional Water Quality Control Board (RB5) board meeting, requests were made for more stringent permit requirements for dairy operations. The dairy industry proposed that UC-Davis complete a study of pharmaceutical use on California dairies in order to generate current and objective data with which to inform the permit development process. To obtain the data required, a survey of practicing dairy veterinarians was conducted to provide a point of reference for evaluating pharmaceutical use specific to California dairies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2013; 219
